name: meshcentral
description: MeshCentral is a full-featured self-hosted remote support platform that provides remote desktop, terminal, file transfers, and agent-based monitoring across devices with user and group management.

features.title: Remote Desktop
features.description: Access and control remote computers through web-based VNC or RDP connections

features.title: Terminal Access
features.description: Open command-line sessions on remote machines for administration tasks

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Upload and download files between local and remote systems through the web interface

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Install lightweight agents on devices for persistent remote access and monitoring

features.title: Multi
features.description: Manage Windows, Linux, and macOS devices from a single interface

features.title: User Management
features.description: Create accounts with granular permissions for accessing specific devices or features

features.title: Device Grouping
features.description: Organize managed devices into groups for easier navigation and bulk operations

features.title: Session Recording
features.description: Record remote desktop sessions for compliance, training, or security review
